partintro.para: The cache plugin is composed of sample codes intended to guide basic use of Cache Service, which is provided to help easy usage of OSCache of opensymphony, and reference libraries necessary to use them.
Install cache plugin by entering the command in the Command window as follows.
The installation result can be checked through the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
